Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pentapeptide TLSAC (Natural AMPs, bacteriocins; Gram-negative bacteria, prokaryotes, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Pseudomonas aeruginosastrain PAST18, isolated from soil

Literature.Author: Deb S, Dutta TK. 2023
Literature.Reference: Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2023 Apr 21;663:78-86. doi: 10.1016/j.bbrc.2023.04.069.PMID: 37119769.PubMed
Literature.Title: Characterization of an antimicrobial pentapeptide produced by a drug-sensitive Pseudomonas aeruginosa strain PAST18

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: It is encoded in a symporter protein of the source organism. APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (40%) toEP5-1GRAVY 1.32; M Wt: 493.582; mol formula:  C19H35N5O8S1; Mol Ex Coeff: 0.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 25 uM), S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 30 uM), E. faecium (MIC 40 uM), K. pneumonia (MIC 30 uM), A. baumannii ATCC BAA-1605 (MIC 25 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 30 uM), fungi C. albicans (MIC 50 uM), A. solani (MIC 20 uM), and U. maydis (MIC 30 uM). MBC values are slightly higher (ratio MBC/MIC 1.1-1.75). It has an effect on biofilms as well.Toxicity: Showed dose-dependent toxicity to HEK-293 cells (~30% death at 40 uM).  Es. 5/2023
